entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: E 20 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
